    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfiguringPageCacheFactory

        public ConfiguringPageCacheFactory​(FileSystemAbstraction fs,
                                   Config config,
                                   PageCacheTracer pageCacheTracer,
                                   Log log,
                                   VersionContextSupplier versionContextSupplier,
                                   JobScheduler scheduler,
                                   SystemNanoClock clock,
                                   MemoryPools memoryPools)
        Construct configuring page cache factory
        Parameters:
        fs - fileSystem file system that page cache will be based on
        config - page swapper configuration
        pageCacheTracer - global page cache tracer
        log - page cache factory log
        versionContextSupplier - cursor context factory
        scheduler - job scheduler to execute page cache jobs
        clock - the clock source used by the page cache.
